title: League wont open

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: Whenever I try to open league I get this error message, "The application was unable to start correctly (0xc0000142). Click OK to close the application." I haven't played in awhile and I think the game was attempting to update when I clicked it. Now I just keep getting this error message.

replies.body: Ayyyy this is a new error code for me! From the way it's happening, it really makes me think this is a permissions related issue where League isn't able to access the files it needs to launch correctly. Let's test that first with the steps in the [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions). Make sure you're running the game as admin, and if that doesn't help try changing the compatibility mode to match your OS.
I did everything int he guide and was still getting the error. But then after restarting my PC the error went away, THANK YOU
